languages.text: "Как же так вышло, что великий и ужасный Маражай был лишь драконом кабала, а не архонтом?"
"How is it that the great and terrifying Marazhai was only the Dracon of the Kabal and not its Archon?"
languages.original_text: "Как же так вышло, что великий и ужасный Маражай был лишь драконом кабала, а не архонтом?"

traits.locale_text: "How is it that the great and terrifying Marazhai was only the Dracon of the Kabal and not its Archon?"
"How is it that the great and terrifying Marazhai was only the Dracon of the Kabal and not its Archon?"
"How is it that the great and terrifying Marazhai was only the Dracon of the Kabal and not its Archon?"
"How is it that the great and terrifying Marazhai was only the Dracon of the Kabal and not its Archon?"

languages.text: «¿Por qué el gran y terrible Marazhai solo era Dracón de la Kábala y no su Arconte?».
languages.original_text: "How is it that the great and terrifying Marazhai was only the Dracon of the Kabal and not its Archon?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué el gran y terrible Marazhai solo era Dracón de la Kábala y no su Arconte?».

languages.text: “这么伟大、这么可怕的玛拉斋，怎么只是阴谋团的裁决官，而不是执政官？”
languages.original_text: "How is it that the great and terrifying Marazhai was only the Dracon of the Kabal and not its Archon?"

traits.locale_text: “这么伟大、这么可怕的玛拉斋，怎么只是阴谋团的裁决官，而不是执政官？”

languages.text: 「偉大で恐ろしいマラズハイが、アーコンではなく陰謀団のドラコンに留まったのはなぜだ？」
languages.original_text: "How is it that the great and terrifying Marazhai was only the Dracon of the Kabal and not its Archon?"

traits.locale_text: 「偉大で恐ろしいマラズハイが、アーコンではなく陰謀団のドラコンに留まったのはなぜだ？」

languages.text: « Comment se fait-il que le grand Marazhai, si terrifiant soit-il, ait été relégué au rôle de dracon de la Kabale au lieu de devenir son archonte ? »
languages.original_text: "How is it that the great and terrifying Marazhai was only the Dracon of the Kabal and not its Archon?"

traits.locale_text: « Comment se fait-il que le grand Marazhai, si terrifiant soit-il, ait été relégué au rôle de dracon de la Kabale au lieu de devenir son archonte ? »

languages.text: "Wieso war der große und furchterregende Marazhai nur der Dracon der Kabale und nicht ihr Archon?"
languages.original_text: "How is it that the great and terrifying Marazhai was only the Dracon of the Kabal and not its Archon?"

traits.locale_text: "Wieso war der große und furchterregende Marazhai nur der Dracon der Kabale und nicht ihr Archon?"

languages.text: "Peki yüce, haşmetli Marazhai'ın Kabal Arkonu değil de Drakonu olması neden?"
languages.original_text: "How is it that the great and terrifying Marazhai was only the Dracon of the Kabal and not its Archon?"

traits.locale_text: "Peki yüce, haşmetli Marazhai'ın Kabal Arkon'u değil de Drakon'u olması neden?"
